SEARCH
Module com.example.demo
Package com.example.demo.Strategy

Class UserFiringStrategy

java.lang.Object
com.example.demo.Strategy.UserFiringStrategy
All Implemented Interfaces:
FiringStrategy
public class UserFiringStrategy extends Object implements FiringStrategy
Implements the FiringStrategy interface which defines firing behavior for userplane.

  • Constructor Details

    • UserFiringStrategy

      public UserFiringStrategy(ProjectilesFactory projectileFactory, double screenWidth)
      Constructs UserFiringStrategy with ProjectilesFactory and screen width.
      Parameters:
      projectileFactory - : factory method used to create user projectiles when user fires.
      screenWidth - : width of game screen for user projectile constraints.

  • Method Details

    • fireContinuous

      public ActiveActorDestructible fireContinuous(UserPlane plane)
      Handles continuous firing logic for userplane.
      Parameters:
      plane - : userplane from which the projectile is to be fired.
      Returns:
      ActiveActorDestructible which represents the fired projectile, or null if no projectile was fired.

    • fireRapid

      public ActiveActorDestructible fireRapid(UserPlane plane)
      Handles rapid firing logic for userplane.
      Parameters:
      plane - : userplane from which the projectile is to be fired.
      Returns:
      ActiveActorDestructible which represents the fired projectile, or null if no projectile was fired.

    • fire

      public ActiveActorDestructible fire(FighterPlane plane)
      Fires projectile from userplane. If player fires, the projectile is created using the ProjectilesFactory at userplane's current position. Then, userplane firing sound effect is played if AudioManager is initialised in UserPlane.
      Specified by:
      fire in interface FiringStrategy
      Parameters:
      plane - : userplane from which the projectile is to be fired.
      Returns:
      ActiveActorDestructible which represents the fired projectile, or null if no projectile was fired.
